text: (tavada) ovun (tamange niveshi) sitiminma (yuddhayehi maranayata pat vu) tamange sahodarayin gæna “ovunda apiva anugamanaya kara, (niveshi rændi) sitiyehu nam, (yuddhayata gos mese) kapanu nolabannehuya” yayida pævasuha. (ebævin nabiye!) oba mese kiyanu: “(ættenma) oba satyaya pavasannan vasayen sitinnehu nam, (ovunva mokakda?) oba, obavama (puluvan nam) maranayen bera ganu!”
